GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of the available endpoints of the api

POST /api/create_account.description: Returns an object representing the user upon successful request
POST /api/create_account.queries: No queries needed for this endpoint

POST /api/sign_in.description: Returns an object representing the user upon successful request
POST /api/sign_in.queries: No queries needed for this endpoint

POST /api/sign_out.description: Returns a confirmation message upon successful request
POST /api/sign_out.queries: No queries needed for this endpoint

PATCH /api/account_details.description: Returns an object representing the user upon successful request
PATCH /api/account_details.queries: No queries needed for this endpoint

GET /api/books.description: Returns an array of book objects upon successful request
GET /api/books.queries: No queries needed for this endpoint yet

books.title: The Routledge International Handbook of the Sociology of Education
